title: Time for Eggs
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 24 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR70L
description: What steps are involved in collecting eggs? Time for Eggs allows students to follow a girl and her dad as they gather and prepare eggs to eat. Detailed illustrations, high- frequency words, and repetitive phrases support early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to sequence events and to identify and use verbs.
reviewWords: carry, collect, cook, count, crack, eggs
